product.title: Kawaii Power Nap Head Rest Cushion | NEW
product.body_html:
• Description
  • Cleaning
  • Shipping

  • Take a nap without leaving your desk with these whimsical cushions

    Are you feeling tired after a long day of work or studying at your desk? Do you need a cozy and cute companion to help you relax and recharge? Then you should try out these supportive Head Rest Cushions!

    These smart cushions are shaped to support your neck, head and arms with adorable animal designs. You can choose from a selection of a bear, cat, pig, shiba and more. They are soft, comfortable and super cuddly. Make your power naps more comfortable!

    Featuring six different styles with cute expressions, animals, and a unique shape made to support your neck and head! 

    Measures 25 x 30cm


    What are you waiting for?

    Get the perfect power nap whilst at your desk so you feel refreshed or whilst you're travelling so when you arrive at your destination you are energised, awake, and free from neck pain. This isn't just any old neck support pillow, the shape is made to support your neck even more compared to the basic ones you get down the road.

    An unforgettable gift for travellers and hard workers

    This cushion collection makes for the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, and every other special occasion you can think of! This will definitely be used all year round and for many years to come.

    Find more kawaii goodies at     www.kawaiies.com!

    Features

    ✈️ Filling: PP Cotton
    ✈️ Outer Material: Premium Polyester
    ✈️ Helps with your sleeping position
    ✈️ Six designs to choose from
    ✈️ Unique shape to support your neck
    ✈️ Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material
    ✈️ Allergy-free and asthma-friendly

  • Step 1: Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

    Step 2: Wash our plushie in cold water using a mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the plushie in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the plushie has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • We are proud to offer International Tracked Shipping to 200+ countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Delivery times are around 5 to 15 business days.
    Processing times are around 1 to 4 business days.
